# My Article

[Link to article]('https://hbr.org/2019/01/data-science-and-the-art-of-persuasion')

## Article Summary

This article primarily focuses on the loss of information between data scientists
and the decision makers at many companies. This effect exists even at companies 
that have poured a considerable amount of resources into their data analysis 
efforts.
